name: send_ephemeral_message
description: Send an ephemeral message (one that only the recipient can see)

input_parameters.name: user_id
input_parameters.description: The ID of the user to show the ephemeral message to

input_parameters.name: channel_id
input_parameters.description: The conversation ID for the channel you are sending the message to

input_parameters.name: message
input_parameters.description: The textual message to send to ephemerally (previously accepted as `text`)

input_parameters.name: thread_ts
input_parameters.description: The `ts` identifier of an _existing_ message to [send this message to as a reply](/surfaces/messages#threading).

output_parameters.description: The channel-specific unique identifier for this message, also serves as a confirmation that the message was sent.
output_parameters.name: message_ts
